Story.Name: YuriHakuStoryEVENT
Story.Desc:
[NAME] arrived to hear the secrets of this strange Law. 
The warrior, dressed in strange and foreign garb, glared at [NAME] with the fierce eyes of someone who had seen endless battles. Black, putrefied veins wove their way along their musculature and [NAME] realised belatedly that one of their arms was hanging limply by their side. 
"I have reached my end," the warrior explained, "Taken in too much destructive force. Though I thought myself a ruler, I could not stand before Heaven. Perhaps in another life, you could have been a ruler yourself. Bring knowledge of this law to one with power." 
The warrior's commanding voice fell upon [NAME] like a vicious wind, though they meant no harm. As they spoke, they withdrew a piece of paper from within their being - a ragged strip dense with information. They held it forward for [NAME] to read.

li.OKResult: me:AddMsg(XT("[NAME] read the strip, and gained knowledge of a new Law. Disintegrating into their being, the strip of paper was no more. When [NAME] looked up, the warrior was nowhere to be seen."));me:UnLockGong("YuriHakuLaw");story:RemoveBindItem();
